summary: Balamich\'s Armor is my first mod I ever made cone try it out!
descriptionHtml:
Balamich Has given you the right to his Treasure at skyforge now you must fight him! there is a location near one of the shrines in white run with a note and locked chest (if the note is not there the location to Balamich is in wolf skull cave) the armor isnt really much a armor its more of a cover that gives you a cool look and stats.
Balamichs Start- Is a blade with a whole new enchantment yes it can be disenchanted but it cannot me crafted or sharped
Balamich\'s Soul- is a plate that goes over your body that gives you a ghost like effect while keeping the armor you had currently on, on  (I am not sure if this will work with other armor mods)
Balamich\'s Sight- is a helmet with frost clock, dragon priest ultra mask and a few other things on it

HAPPY HUNTING EVERY ONE (Please i can\'t stress enough if there is any bugs or glitches tell me I found a few already that i am trying to fix but so far I can\'t)

Updated got rid of the .9.bak thanks you for pointing that out to me and still looking for bugs please again i know i\'m annoying tell me if you see any bugs thanks you

Future updates- Making Balamich stronger, Story line, New Npcs, New locations, New weapons and armor and new Followers. 

Hi everyone I would like some help on a small project I am doing called The Span It comes with a new Playable Character, New Npc, Ne Followers, New weapons and armor and new Story line I have Followers, Playable Character,  and weapons/armor I just need to make the story line and npc. The followers for some reason I made a location for them and when I walk out of that location they dont fallow so I need help with that, Some times the playable character body doesn\'t show only the head will so I need help with that and for the rest I need a good story line and I need some people to help me write it out and make the right Npcs for it. 

New-
Time Shifter Race
Time shifter armor
Bow of Time
Shifter Followers 
Location: The Span 

Please message me at  https://www.facebook.com/DeadMansVillage, or if you dont have a facebook here or skype my skype name is deammansvillage but try to get me on here or facebook thank you
author: deadmansvillage
